author: aadamchik
msg: refactoring - injecting class and property descriptors into the mapping objects

author: dain
msg: Added new JarFile based class loader which lets us have complete control over the file locks.
The new class loader was created by merging the XBean JarFileClassLoader, some of the sandbox classloader and the Jar handling code from deployment.
The new class loader is disabled by default and can be enabled with -DXorg.apache.geronimo.NewClassLoader=true

author: plightbo
msg: xstream is now required due to the new DebuggingInterceptor/PrettyPrintWriter
